description:
Another of Shipon`s classmates, he is seen hanging out with Joey and Pierre. Others call him by his nickname, Dai, which is another reading for his given name in kanji (å¤§). [Spoiler]In the last few episodes he becomes very serious and says some very influential things which is broadcast through the solar system as the last sounds from Stellvia before the inevitable end.[/Spoiler]
(Wikipedia)
name: Odawara Masaru
